name: #1 Matt Mora Stan Game
description:
Made for Prototype Studio at the NYU Game Center. Everyone was assigned a classmate, and we had to make a game for that one person.

So this is a game for one person... my classmate Matt.

If you are not my classmate Matt.... good fuckin luck playing this, you non-Matt fool!!!!!!!!!!

***

Important references:

Matt's chess game

Matt's snail game

***

R to restart.

***

All trivia used with permission! Thank you Matt for patiently answering all of my questions about your personal life this week lmao.
